verses.verse: <S%G1161>Now<s%> there was a <S%G444>man<s%> of the <S%G5330>Pharisees,<s%> <S%G3686>named<s%> <S%G3530>Nicodemus,<s%> a <S%G758>ruler<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews;<s%>

<S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3778>man<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> to Him by <S%G3571>night,<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, <S%G4461>"Rabbi,<s%> we <S%G3609>know<s%> that You have <S%G2064>come<s%> from <S%G2316>God<s%> [as] a <S%G1320>teacher;<s%> for <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>one<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G4592>signs<s%> that You <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G1437>unless<s%> <S%G3361><s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> is with him."

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G281>"Truly,<s%> <S%G281>truly,<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, <S%G1437>unless<s%> <S%G3361><s%> <S%G5100>one<s%> is <S%G1080>born<s%> <S%G509>again,<s%> he <S%G1410>cannot<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3708>see<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>"

<S%G3530>Nicodemus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, <S%G4459>"How<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> be <S%G1080>born<s%> when he is <S%G1088>old<s%>? He <S%G1410>cannot<s%> <S%G3361><s%> <S%G1525>enter<s%> a <S%G1208>second<s%> <S%G1208>time<s%> into his mother's <S%G2836>womb<s%> and be <S%G1080>born,<s%> can he?"

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered,<s%> <S%G281>"Truly,<s%> <S%G281>truly,<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, <S%G1437>unless<s%> <S%G3361><s%> <S%G5100>one<s%> is <S%G1080>born<s%> of <S%G5204>water<s%> and the <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%> he <S%G1410>cannot<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1525>enter<s%> into the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>
"That which is <S%G1080>born<s%> of the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> is <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> and that which is <S%G1080>born<s%> of the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> is <S%G4151>spirit<s%>.
"Do not <S%G2296>marvel<s%> that I <S%G3004>said<s%> to you, 'You <S%G1163>must<s%> be <S%G1080>born<s%> <S%G509>again.<s%>'

" The <S%G4151>wind<s%> <S%G4154>blows<s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> it <S%G2309>wishes<s%> and you <S%G191>hear<s%> the <S%G5456>sound<s%> of it, but do not <S%G3609>know<s%> <S%G4159>where<s%> it <S%G2064>comes<s%> from and <S%G4226>where<s%> it is <S%G5217>going;<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> is <S%G3956>everyone<s%> who is <S%G1080>born<s%> of the <S%G4151>Spirit.<s%>"
<S%G3530>Nicodemus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, <S%G4459>"How<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> be?"

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, "Are you the <S%G1320>teacher<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel,<s%> and do not <S%G1097>understand<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%>?

<S%G281>"Truly,<s%> <S%G281>truly,<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, we <S%G2980>speak<s%> that <S%G3739>which<s%> we <S%G3609>know,<s%> and <S%G3140>bear<s%> <S%G3140>witness<s%> of that <S%G3739>which<s%> we have <S%G3708>seen;<s%> and you do not <S%G2983>receive<s%> our <S%G3141>witness.<s%>

<S%G1487>"If<s%> I <S%G3004>told<s%> you <S%G1919>earthly<s%> <S%G1919>things<s%> and you do not <S%G4100>believe,<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> shall you <S%G4100>believe<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> I <S%G3004>tell<s%> you <S%G2032>heavenly<s%> <S%G2032>things<s%>?
"And <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>one<s%> has <S%G305>ascended<s%> into <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> but He who <S%G2597>descended<s%> from <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> [even] the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man.<s%>

"And as <S%G3475>Moses<s%> <S%G5312>lifted<s%> up the <S%G3789>serpent<s%> in the <S%G2048>wilderness,<s%> even <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man<s%> be <S%G5312>lifted<s%> up;
that <S%G3956>whoever<s%> <S%G4100>believes<s%> may in Him <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life.<s%>

"For <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G25>loved<s%> the <S%G2889>world,<s%> that He <S%G1325>gave<s%> His <S%G3439>only<s%> <S%G3439>begotten<s%> <S%G5207>Son,<s%> that <S%G3956>whoever<s%> <S%G4100>believes<s%> in Him should not <S%G622>perish,<s%> but <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life.<s%>

"For <S%G2316>God<s%> did not <S%G649>send<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> into the <S%G2889>world<s%> to <S%G2919>judge<s%> the <S%G2889>world,<s%> but that the <S%G2889>world<s%> should be <S%G4982>saved<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> Him.

"He who <S%G4100>believes<s%> in Him is not <S%G2919>judged;<s%> he who does not <S%G4100>believe<s%> has been <S%G2919>judged<s%> <S%G2235>already,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> he has not <S%G4100>believed<s%> in the <S%G3686>name<s%> of the <S%G3439>only<s%> <S%G3439>begotten<s%> <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

"And <S%G3778>this<s%> is the <S%G2920>judgment,<s%> that the <S%G5457>light<s%> is <S%G2064>come<s%> into the <S%G2889>world,<s%> and <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G25>loved<s%> the <S%G4655>darkness<s%> <S%G3123>rather<s%> <S%G2228>than<s%> the <S%G5457>light;<s%> for their <S%G2041>deeds<s%> were <S%G4190>evil.<s%>

"For <S%G3956>everyone<s%> who <S%G4238>does<s%> <S%G5337>evil<s%> <S%G3404>hates<s%> the <S%G5457>light,<s%> and does not <S%G2064>come<s%> to the <S%G5457>light,<s%> <S%G2443>lest<s%> <S%G3361><s%> his <S%G2041>deeds<s%> should be <S%G1651>exposed.<s%>

"But he who <S%G4160>practices<s%> the <S%G225>truth<s%> <S%G2064>comes<s%> to the <S%G5457>light,<s%> that his <S%G2041>deeds<s%> may be <S%G5319>manifested<s%> as having <S%G1510>been<s%> <S%G2038>wrought<s%> in <S%G2316>God.<s%>"

<S%G3326>After<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> and His <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> into the <S%G1093>land<s%> of <S%G2453>Judea,<s%> and <S%G1563>there<s%> He was <S%G1304>spending<s%> <S%G1304>time<s%> with them and <S%G907>baptizing.<s%>

And <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> was <S%G907>baptizing<s%> in <S%G137>Aenon<s%> <S%G1451>near<s%> <S%G4530>Salim,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> there was <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G5204>water<s%> <S%G1563>there;<s%> and they were <S%G3854>coming<s%> and were being <S%G907>baptized.<s%>
For <S%G2491>John<s%> had not <S%G3768>yet<s%> <S%G1510>been<s%> <S%G906>thrown<s%> into <S%G5438>prison.<s%>
There <S%G1096>arose<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> a <S%G2214>discussion<s%> on the part of John's <S%G3101>disciples<s%> with a <S%G2453>Jew<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> <S%G2512>purification.<s%>

And they <S%G2064>came<s%> to <S%G2491>John<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G4461>"Rabbi,<s%> He <S%G3739>who<s%> was with you <S%G4008>beyond<s%> the <S%G2446>Jordan,<s%> to <S%G3739>whom<s%> you have <S%G3140>borne<s%> <S%G3140>witness,<s%> <S%G2396>behold,<s%> He is <S%G907>baptizing,<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> are <S%G2064>coming<s%> to Him."

<S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said,<s%> "A <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G2983>receive<s%> <S%G3756>nothing,<s%> <S%G3762><s%> <S%G1437>unless<s%> <S%G3361><s%> it has <S%G1510>been<s%> <S%G1325>given<s%> him from <S%G3772>heaven.<s%>

"You <S%G846>yourselves<s%> <S%G3140>bear<s%> me <S%G3140>witness,<s%> that I <S%G3004>said,<s%> 'I <S%G1510>am<s%> not the <S%G5547>Christ,<s%>' but, 'I have <S%G1510>been<s%> <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G1715>before<s%> Him.'

"He who <S%G2192>has<s%> the <S%G3565>bride<s%> is the <S%G3566>bridegroom;<s%> but the <S%G5384>friend<s%> of the <S%G3566>bridegroom,<s%> who <S%G2476>stands<s%> and <S%G191>hears<s%> him, <S%G5463>rejoices<s%> <S%G5479>greatly<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> of the bridegroom's <S%G5456>voice.<s%> And <S%G3767>so<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G5479>joy<s%> of <S%G1699>mine<s%> has been <S%G4137>made<s%> <S%G4137>full.<s%>
"He <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G837>increase,<s%> but I must <S%G1642>decrease.<s%>

"He who <S%G2064>comes<s%> from <S%G509>above<s%> is <S%G1883>above<s%> <S%G3956>all,<s%> he who is of the <S%G1093>earth<s%> is from the <S%G1093>earth<s%> and <S%G2980>speaks<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth.<s%> He who <S%G2064>comes<s%> from <S%G3772>heaven<s%> is <S%G1883>above<s%> <S%G3956>all.<s%>

<S%G3739>"What<s%> He has <S%G3708>seen<s%> and <S%G191>heard,<s%> of that He <S%G3140>bears<s%> <S%G3140>witness;<s%> and <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>man<s%> <S%G2983>receives<s%> His <S%G3141>witness.<s%>
"He who has <S%G2983>received<s%> His <S%G3141>witness<s%> has <S%G4972>set<s%> his <S%G4972>seal<s%> to [this,] that <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G227>true.<s%>

"For He <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> has <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G2980>speaks<s%> the <S%G4487>words<s%> of <S%G2316>God;<s%> for He <S%G1325>gives<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G3756>without<s%> <S%G1537><s%> <S%G3358>measure.<s%>
"The <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G25>loves<s%> the <S%G5207>Son,<s%> and has <S%G1325>given<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things<s%> into His <S%G5495>hand.<s%>

"He who <S%G4100>believes<s%> in the <S%G5207>Son<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life;<s%> but he who does not <S%G544>obey<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> shall not <S%G3708>see<s%> <S%G2222>life,<s%> but the <S%G3709>wrath<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3306>abides<s%> on him."
